lead_paragraph: SIDEROW--Neil, beloved father, grandfather, business partner and friend, passed away peacefully at home on December 4th, 2015. He is survived by his sons Stephen, Brad and Josh, his daughters-in-law Saskia and Vanessa, and his six grandchildren, Abigail, Nathaniel, Sofia, Liam, Eli and Mia. Above all, Neil was a mensch. We will miss his charm, his enthusiasm for life and his boundless love for family, the Jewish people and the State of Israel. 1/3
